title: Native Artists of Africa: Visits the Workshops of Five Tribal Artists
description: The beauty of art, power of place, and the continuity of culture are explored by Moore in this rare glimpse into the lives of five native artists of Africa, including a rug-maker from the Berber tribe in Morocco and an artist from the Kalahari in Botswana. Part of The Rainbow Warrior Artists Series. Color photos.
author: Reavis Moore
